title: How to Make Rice Stuffed Turkey

steps.headline: In the skillet, heat oil, sauté onions,celery and some salt and pepper until onions are clear.
Add rice,(If you decide to use this)beaten eggs, and poultry seasoning.
To stuff and roast the turkey:
Put dressing in right before putting in oven.
steps.description: Using poultry pins, pin the legs together.

steps.headline: Put the turkey in the pan breast side up.
steps.description: Season the skin.Cover with a vented lid.Roast @ 350 degrees until the thermometer in the thickest part of the breast says 180 degrees.

steps.headline: 30 min.
steps.description: before turkey is done, remove lid to allow browning. Get out an electric knife and carve on a cutting board or a carving plate.

steps.headline: Eat turkey and dressing and enjoy!

text: To make the dressing itself:  In the skillet, heat oil, sauté onions,celery and some salt and pepper until onions are clear.  Add rice,(If you decide to use this)beaten eggs, and poultry seasoning. Mix thoroughly. To stuff and roast the turkey:  Put dressing in right before putting in oven. Using poultry pins, pin the legs together. Put the turkey in the pan breast side up. Season the skin.Cover with a vented lid.Roast @ 350 degrees until the thermometer in the thickest part of the breast says 180 degrees. 30 min. before turkey is done, remove lid to allow browning. Get out an electric knife and carve on a cutting board or a carving plate. Eat turkey and dressing and enjoy!
